Game keeps crashing on steam deck

As someone who doesn't care about PVE in amy manner, I give the game a solid 8.5/10 despite all the complaints many may have.

If it was as bad as they claim, I would have 4000+ hours prior to the steam release, nor would I still be sinking hours upon hours into the game every week.

I was excited at launch, but I've only grown more disappointed with every scummy paywall feature added with each update. The core game is on par with the original - but the monetization and state of the game is so obviously exploitative that it's insulting.

Say what you will but I originally pre-purchased overwatch 1 before it came out, now ow 2 is here on steam and I still got the skin. I hear a some people like the game and that the company is questionable

Anyways Starcraft on Steam when? Or more non drm distribution if you feel generous
